info.author: Filipe Guerreiro
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License v3 or later (GPLv3+)
info.description:
# maven-downloader
A maven repository artifact download tool written in Python.

This is a small CLI, ripped out version of Ansible's maven artifact fetcher, which in turn is based on hamnis/maven-artifact project. Most implementation credits go to them.

Works with both Python 2 and 3.

## Dependencies

- lxml
- boto3 (if using AWS S3)

## Installation

```
pip install maven_artifact_downloader
```

## Usage

```
maven_artifact_downloader --group_id GROUP_ID --artifact_id ARTIFACT_ID
                          [--repository_url REPOSITORY_URL] 
                          [--version VERSION] [--classifier CLASSIFIER] [--extension EXTENSION]
                          [--username USERNAME] [--password PASSWORD]
                          [--user_agent USER_AGENT] [--state {present,absent}]
                          [--timeout TIMEOUT] [--dest DEST] [--directory_mode]
                          [--validate_certs VALIDATE_CERTS] [--keep_name KEEP_NAME]
                          [--verify_checksum {never,download,change,always}]
```


## Examples

### Download the latest version of the JUnit framework artifact from Maven Central

```
maven_artifact_downloader 
    --group_id junit 
    --artifact_id junit 
    --dest /tmp/junit-latest.jar
```

### Download JUnit 4.11 from Maven Central

```
maven_artifact_downloader 
    --group_id junit 
    --artifact_id junit 
    --version 4.11 
    --dest /tmp/junit-4.11.jar
```

### Download an artifact from a private repository requiring authentication
```
maven_artifact_downloader
    --group_id com.company
    --artifact_id library-name
    --repository_url 'https://repo.company.com/maven'
    --username user
    --password pass
    --dest /tmp/library-name-latest.jar
```

### Download a WAR File to the Tomcat webapps directory to be deployed

```
maven_artifact_downloader 
    --group_id com.company 
    --artifact_id web-app 
    --extension war 
    --repository_url 'https://repo.company.com/maven' 
    --dest /var/lib/tomcat7/webapps/web-app.war
```

## License

GNU General Public License v3.0 or later

See [LICENSE](LICENSE) to see the full text.
